title: Statements about isolated solid charged conductor

content.question: All the following statements about an isolated, solid charged conductor are correct EXCEPT:

choices.label: All parts of the conductor are at the same potential.
All excess charge resides on the outer surface.
The net charge enclosed by any surface lying entirely within the conductor must equal zero.
The electric field E just outside the conductor is directed parallel to the surface.
The electric field intensity inside the conductor is zero.

content.answer: The electric field E just outside the conductor is directed parallel to the surface.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
